prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan when she traveled to Munich, from Michigan, with her then husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's older cousin.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan when she traveled to Munich, from Michigan, with her then husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's older cousin.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What were Stefan's true thoughts, feelings, and reactions when I caressed his wrist at the restaurant?

Stefan should be represented by the 3rd house (cousin in-law), and Me by the Ascendant.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a concise compilation of the horary chart data that will serve as our basis for analysis. In this query the querent (Melissa) is represented by the Ascendant, while Stefan is indicated by the 3rd house (with its cusp beginning in Libra, whose ruler is Venus). The following points enumerate the relevant data:

1. Chart Structure and House Cusps
 • Querent (Melissa): Ascendant at 3° Virgo
 • Stefan (cousin in-law): 3rd house cusp beginning at 22° Libra
   – Ruler of Libra (and hence Stefan’s significator): Venus
 • Other key house cusps (to frame overall context):
   – 4th House: 27° Scorpio
   – 5th House: starts at 6° Capricorn (contains Mercury and Pluto)
   – 6th House: starts at 8° Aquarius (contains the Sun)
   – 7th House: starts at 3° Pisces (contains Moon and Saturn)
   – 8th House: starts at 26° Pisces (contains Venus, Neptune, North Node and Chiron)
   – 9th House: starts at 22° Aries (contains Uranus)
   – 10th House: starts at 27° Taurus (contains Jupiter)
   – 11th House: starts at 6° Cancer (contains Mars)
   – 12th House: starts at 8° Leo

2. Key Planetary Positions (with house placements as given)
 • Sun in Aquarius at 12°23′ – located in the 6th House
 • Moon in Pisces at 15°14′ – in the 7th House
 • Mercury in Aquarius at 6°24′ – in the 5th House (its role is further underscored as the ruler of the Ascendant in Virgo)
 • Venus in Pisces at 27°27′ – in the 8th House (Stefan’s significator by virtue of ruling Libra)
 • Mars in Cancer (r) at 20°27′ – in the 11th House
 • Jupiter in Gemini (r) at 11°17′ – in the 10th House
 • Saturn in Pisces at 17°25′ – in the 7th House
 • Uranus in Taurus at 23°15′ – in the 9th House
 • Neptune in Pisces at 27°58′ – in the 8th House
 • Pluto in Aquarius at 2°03′ – in the 5th House
 • North Node in Pisces at 29°51′ (r) – in the 8th House
 • Chiron in Aries at 19°30′ – placement governed by the house cuts
 • Additional note: the Moon is a waxing crescent and the chart overall exhibits a Bowl shape with dominant Mutable inner planets.

3. Major Aspects (noted by orb and connection, all aspects are considered as they may influence the reading in horary practice):
 • Neptune Sextile MC (orb 0°)
 • Venus Sextile MC (orb 0°)
 • MC Opposition IC (orb 0°)
 • Venus Conjunction Neptune (orb 0°)
 • Neptune Trine IC (orb 0°)
 • Venus Trine IC (orb 0°)
 • Mars Square Chiron (orb 1°)
 • Sun Trine Jupiter (orb 1°)
 • North Node Sextile MC (orb 2°)
 • Neptune Conjunction North Node (orb 2°)
 • Venus Conjunction North Node (orb 2°)
 • Moon Conjunction Saturn (orb 2°)
 • North Node Trine IC (orb 2°)
 • Pluto Sextile North Node (orb 3°)
 • Mars Sextile Uranus (orb 3°)
 • Mars Trine Saturn (orb 3°)
 • Uranus Sextile Neptune (orb 4°)
 • Venus Sextile Uranus (orb 4°)
 • Moon Square Jupiter (orb 4°)
 • Uranus Opposition IC (orb 4°)
 • Uranus Conjunction MC (orb 4°)
 • Mercury Conjunction Pluto (orb 4°)
 • Pluto Sextile IC (orb 5°)
 • Venus Sextile Pluto (orb 5°)
 • Pluto Trine MC (orb 5°)
 • Mercury Trine Jupiter (orb 5°)
 • Moon Trine Mars (orb 5°)
 • Saturn Sextile Uranus (orb 6°)
 • Ascendant Square IC (orb 6°)
 • Ascendant Square MC (orb 6°)
 • Jupiter Square Saturn (orb 6°)
 • Sun Conjunction Mercury (orb 6°)
 • Mars Trine IC (orb 7°)
 • Mars Trine Neptune (orb 7°)
 • Venus Trine Mars (orb 7°)

4. Patterns Formed in the Chart (which point to dynamic relationships among significators):
 • Grand Trine: Involving Venus (27° Pisces), the IC (27° Scorpio), Mars (20° Cancer), and Neptune (27° Pisces)
 • Castle: Defined by Venus (27° Pisces), the IC (27° Scorpio), Mars (20° Cancer), Neptune (27° Pisces), Uranus (23° Taurus) and Pluto (2° Aquarius)
 • T-Square: Involving the MC (27° Taurus), the Ascendant (3° Virgo), and the IC (27° Scorpio)
 • Cradle: Involving Uranus (23° Taurus), the IC (27° Scorpio), Pluto (2° Aquarius), Venus (27° Pisces), the MC (27° Taurus) and the North Node (29° Pisces)

This collection of data—emphasizing the querent’s position (Ascendant in Virgo), Stefan’s indication (3rd house cusp in Libra with ruler Venus in Pisces and the concentrated activity in the 8th House), as well as the primary aspects and configurations—will form the foundation for further detailed interpretation.

4. Patterns Formed in the Chart (which point to dynamic relationships among significators):

 • T-Square: Involving the MC (27° Taurus), the Ascendant (3° Virgo), and the IC (27° Scorpio)
 • Cradle: Involving Uranus (23° Taurus), the IC (27° Scorpio), Pluto (2° Aquarius), Venus (27° Pisces), the MC (27° Taurus) and the North Node (29° Pisces)

This collection of data—emphasizing the querent’s position (Ascendant in Virgo), Stefan’s indication (3rd house cusp in Libra with ruler Venus in Pisces and the concentrated activity in the 8th House), as well as the primary aspects and configurations—will form the foundation for further detailed interpretation.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Drawing upon the horary data provided, the chart indicates the following about Stefan’s reaction when you caressed his wrist:

• His significator is Venus—ruling the 3rd house cusp in Libra—which is positioned at 27° Pisces in the 8th house. This placement channels intense, hidden emotions and transformative, even taboo, energies. Venus conjoins both Neptune and the North Node here; such conjunctions signify that his response is suffused with elusive, almost metaphysical attraction—a stirring of desire that delves into secret realms but remains tempered by illusion and mysticism.

• The expanded Grand Trine involving Venus (in Pisces), Mars (20° Cancer in the 11th house), Neptune (in Pisces in the 8th), and the IC (27° Scorpio) shows a flowing energy in the spheres of sensuality and intimate transformation. This pattern suggests that your touch activated deeply felt sensations, a mix of longing and the promise of a secret or hidden connection.

• However, the influence of Saturn in Pisces (positioned in the 7th house with the Moon) introduces an element of restraint and caution. The Moon’s conjunction with Saturn, alongside other tensions in the arrangement (such as the T-square among the Ascendant, MC, and IC), points to an internal conflict: while a part of him feels the undeniable allure of your caress, another part is weighed down by duty, personal boundaries, or the ramifications of an impulsive emotional unveiling.

• Mercury’s role in Aquarius in the 5th house—conjunct Pluto—reinforces a theme of secret, even covert, communications and hidden motives. There is an undercurrent suggesting that the moment carried more than the superficial; it was charged with a profound, albeit dangerous, potential for transformation, which he recognized but may have been loath to act upon overtly.

Based on these factors, the chart records that Stefan’s internal response was layered. On one level, his reaction was one of immediate, secretive arousal—a surge of suppressed passion stirred by your subtle intimacy. On another level, however, he experienced an internal counterbalance in the form of caution and conflicted duty. His inner awareness is marked by an acknowledgment of forbidden desire, yet his outer reserve remains intact due to structural and emotional constraints.

Thus, his thoughts coursed with a hidden thrill and an almost transgressive longing, intricately interwoven with caution and a protective self-restraint shaped by the responsibilities and inhibitions that govern his personal life.
